name: ​Drag n' Bag 2022
description:
Drag n' Bag is a fast-paced puzzle game requiring you to sort items into
bags based on what kind of item they are. Be mindful of how much space is
left in the bag, overfilling it may cause the customers to get angry, yet
not packing it tightly enough could lead to dissatisfied customers as well.
If you do too poorly, the manager may come and reprimand you, requiring
you to work longer.

Controls:
Left Mouse Button: Pick Up Card
W: Look Up
S: Look Down
Escape: Pause
Credits:
